MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD7 postcode area of Selkirk, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.45am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:42pm on Wednesday, 18 November 2020
